categories: Category:Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1

nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1

Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1 is a young readers adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope with illustrations by Brian Rood. The adaptation is split into six sections, all of which were collected into the The Original Trilogy Stories.

In Star Wars: A New Hope, your favorite Star Wars characters meet for the first time! Join Luke Skywalker as he trains to become a Jedi, Han Solo as he pilots the Millennium Falcon, and Princess Leia as she attempts to escape from Darth Vader's clutches. This eBook collection features 6 stories from the original film, beautifully illustrated by Star Wars artist Brian Rood.
